# Homework Two

```{r}
marriage <- read.csv("../../_data/australian_marriage_tidy.csv")
head(marriage)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Homework Three

### Select
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
select(marriage, "territory")
```

### Filter
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
filter(marriage, `territory` == "Victoria")
```

### Arrange
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
filter(marriage, count > 500000) %>%
  arrange(count)
```

### Summarize
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
summarize(marriage, mean(`count`))
```
